LanguageData.GeneR_GenepackMergeFinished: A new genepack has finished being merged.
LanguageData.GeneR_GenepackCloneFinished: A new genepack has finished being duplicated.
LanguageData.GeneR_GenepackSplitFinished: New genepacks have finished being separated.
LanguageData.GeneR_MessageGenepackCancelledMissingPac: Work on creating a new genepack at {0_labelShort} was cancelled: Missing required genepack.
LanguageData.GeneR_MessageMergeCancelledMissingPack: Work on merging genepacks at {0_labelShort} was cancelled: Missing required genepack.
LanguageData.GeneR_SeparateDesc: Create two smaller genepacks from an existing genepack in your gene library.
LanguageData.GeneR_DublicDesc: Create a copy of a genepack in your gene library.
LanguageData.GeneR_MergeDesc: Create a larger genepack from multiple existing genepacks in your gene library.
LanguageData.GeneR_CancelGenepackDesc: Stop all work on creating new genepacks.
LanguageData.GeneR_ConfirmGenepack: This will cancel the current job, start work on a new genepack?
LanguageData.GeneR_GenepackDurationDesc: Time need to create new genepacks.
LanguageData.GeneR_MessageSelectMoreGenepacks: Must select two or more genepacks to merge.
LanguageData.GeneR_MessageTooFewGenes: Must select a genepack with at least 2 genes to separate.
LanguageData.GeneR_MessageTooManyGenes: Can not create a merged genepack, total genes must be less than {0}.
